The photograph is a genuine image of a t: taken in October 2015 at the end of Golden Week, a week-long national holiday.
The caption frequently attached to the i: claiming it shows China's "50 lane-highway" with drivers merging down to just four lanes, is misleading.
The congestion captured in the photograp: Hong Kong-Macau Expressway, one of the country's busiest roads.
While the toll gate area of the G4 Expre: the road itself is typically a 4-lane highway before and after the toll checkpoint.
